FuncDef:
The set auto-upgrade model command enables or disables the automatic logic upgrade function for boards.
By default, the function of automatic logic upgrade is enabled for boards.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables automatic logic upgrade for boards.
-

Disables automatic logic upgrade for boards.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the function is enabled, the system compares the logic version of a newly inserted board with the current system logic version or compares the log version of boards with a newly upgraded system logic version. If any difference is found, the logic version of the boards is updated.
By default, the function of automatic logic upgrade is enabled for boards.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
